title: Zerlina Maxwell, MSNBC political analyst "The End of White Politics: How to Heal Our Liberal Divide"
description:
MSNBC political analyst Zerlina Maxwell offers her thoughts on identity politics and how to create a more inclusive Democratic party. She’s interviewed by Maria Kumar CEO of Voto Latino.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
